duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and optimize the procurement coordination and contract management process to ensure the timely acquisition of materials and services.
Manage and mitigate change order requests while ensuring regulatory compliance and promoting best practices in procurement processes.
Align procurement strategies to support business needs and optimize the use of frameworks in procurement.
Oversee material expediting to meet project milestones and avoid delays, acting as the liaison between business teams, suppliers, and material management.
Promote a culture of collaboration, innovation, and quality across business areas, while providing continuous growth and development to advance business objectives.
Communicate and influence all levels of management to provide strategic input for business plans and decision making.
Design and provide wide-scale training to internal customers, prioritize objectives, and mediate cross-functional issues.
Provide strategic leadership working across multiple operating companies and geographic locations to articulate the business needs relative to procurement.
Facilitate collaborative decision-making to minimize contractual and commercial risk while optimizing savings and efficiencies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree. Master’s degree a plus. PMP Certification preferred.
